FuncDef:
The device-id command configures an IOAM device ID for the local device.
The undo device-id command restores the IOAM device ID to the default value (0). The device-id command configures an IOAM device ID for the local device. The undo device-id command restores the IOAM device ID to the default value (0). By default, the device ID is 0. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IOAM device ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 16777215. The default value is 0.
